QuestData.Title: Wings Over Highbank
QuestData.Description: Aye, look! I think she's perkin' up already.$B$BOkay $gMr.:Miss; Alliance fancy-pants $c. Is that your base I see on the shore? "Highbank" you say. Can me and my bird hunker down there until she's better?$B$BHop on! We'll fly together back to Highbank!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thordun Hammerblow and fly together back to Highbank.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n! Aiding that downed gryphon-rider has given us our first contact with the old Wildhammer clans. We'll be able to find out who's still left, and in what numbers.$B$BOur campaign is looking up!
